timeline.bodyText: Consider leaving boolean flag if extraCredentials were set or not.
timeline.author: losipiuk

timeline.message:
Add SecurityContext#toString

This yields for more useful logging with e.g.
`LoggingInvocationHandler`, as currently configured in
`io.prestosql.security.AccessControlModule#createAccessControl`.

Add SecurityContext#toString

This yields for more useful logging with e.g.
`LoggingInvocationHandler`, as currently configured in
`io.prestosql.security.AccessControlModule#createAccessControl`.
